mapper.sql: id, name_cn, name_en, workspace, creater, create_time, remark, flag
mapper.select:
select * from sys_style
name_cn = '${nameCn}' or name_en = '${nameEn}'
order by id
SELECT max(substr(name_en, 6)) FROM sys_style where name_en like 'style%';
mapper.insert: insert into sys_style ( name_cn, name_en, workspace, creater, create_time, remark, flag) values (#{styleNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{styleNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{styleWorkspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{styleCreater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{styleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{styleRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{styleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sys_style
name_cn,
name_en,
workspace,
creater,
create_time,
remark,
flag,

mapper.update:
update sys_style
name_cn = #{styleNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_en = #{styleNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workspace = #{styleWorkspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{styleCreater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{styleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{styleRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{styleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{styleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_style set name_cn = #{styleNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{styleNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workspace = #{styleWorkspace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater = #{styleCreater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{styleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{styleRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{styleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{styleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
